Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    The Image class contains static methods for retrieving filepaths to any and all image assets used in the game. This class cannot be instantiated.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COIN_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the coin image used in the shop.
      static java.lang.String FIREWORKS_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the image used in the victory screen.
      static java.lang.String FOREST_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the forest image used in the corners of the map.
      static java.lang.String GRAVESTONE_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the image used in the defeat screen.
      static java.lang.String HOME_BASE_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the home base image.
      static java.lang.String PSR_UNDECIDED_FILEPATH
      The file path for the image used in games of paper scissors rock, before the player has selected a move.
      static java.lang.String UNDISCOVERED_SECTOR_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the image representing sectors which have not yet been discovered.
      static java.lang.String UNROLLED_DICE_IMAGE_FILEPATH
      The file path for the unrolled dice image used in the Dice Rolls game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Image() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String diceImageFilepath(int diceNum)
      Takes a number between 1 and 6 and returns the filepath for the image of a dice showing that number.
      static java.lang.String getHeroPSRImage(java.lang.String choice)
      Returns the filepath for the image representing a hero's choice in a game of paper, scissors, rock.
      static java.lang.String getMapArrowImage(Location direction, java.lang.String color)
      Returns the filepath for an arrow image.
      static java.lang.String getVillainPSRImage(java.lang.String choice)
      Returns the filepath for the image representing a villain's choice in a game of paper, scissors, rock.
      static java.lang.String healingItemImageFilepath(HealingItem healingItem, int size)
      Takes a healing item, and returns the file path of the image of the given size for that healing item.
      static java.lang.String heroImageFilepath(Hero hero, int width, int height)
      Takes a hero instance, and returns the file path for the portrait image of the given size for this hero type.
      static java.lang.String mapImageFilepath(int size)
      Returns the file path for the image of the map item of the given size.
      static java.lang.String powerUpImageFilepath(PowerUpType powerUpType, int size)
      Takes a power up type, and returns the file path of the image of the given size for that power up type.
      static java.lang.String sectorTypeFilepath(SectorType type)
      Given a SectorType, return the file path to the appropriate image for that type, to be displayed on the map panel.
      static java.lang.String villainImageFilepath(Villain villain)
      Returns the file path for the image of a given villain.

    • Method Detail

      • heroImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String heroImageFilepath(Hero hero,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
        Takes a hero instance, and returns the file path for the portrait image of the given size for this hero type.
        Parameters:
        hero - The hero whose image file path should be returned.
        width - The width of the returned image.
        height - The height of the returned image.
        Returns:
        The file path of the portrait image of this hero.

      • powerUpImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String powerUpImageFilepath(PowerUpType powerUpType,
                                                    int size)
        Takes a power up type, and returns the file path of the image of the given size for that power up type.
        Parameters:
        powerUpType - The type of the relevant power up.
        size - The size of the image to return.
        Returns:
        The file path of the image for that power up.

      • healingItemImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String healingItemImageFilepath(HealingItem healingItem,
                                                        int size)
        Takes a healing item, and returns the file path of the image of the given size for that healing item.
        Parameters:
        healingItem - The relevant healing item.
        size - The size of the image to return.
        Returns:
        The file path of the image for that healing item.

      • mapImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String mapImageFilepath(int size)
        Returns the file path for the image of the map item of the given size.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the image to be returned.
        Returns:
        The file path for the map image of the give size.

      • sectorTypeFilepath

        public static java.lang.String sectorTypeFilepath(SectorType type)
        Given a SectorType, return the file path to the appropriate image for that type, to be displayed on the map panel.
        Parameters:
        type - The sector type of the sector to be displayed.
        Returns:
        The file path for the image representing that sector.

      • villainImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String villainImageFilepath(Villain villain)
        Returns the file path for the image of a given villain.
        Parameters:
        villain - The villain for which a filepath is returned
        Returns:
        The filepath to an appropriate image.

      • diceImageFilepath

        public static java.lang.String diceImageFilepath(int diceNum)
        Takes a number between 1 and 6 and returns the filepath for the image of a dice showing that number.
        Parameters:
        diceNum - The number showing on the dice image.
        Returns:
        The filepath of the appropriate dice image.

      • getHeroPSRImage

        public static java.lang.String getHeroPSRImage(java.lang.String choice)
        Returns the filepath for the image representing a hero's choice in a game of paper, scissors, rock.
        Parameters:
        choice - A string representation of the hero's choice.
        Returns:
        A filepath to the appropriate image.

      • getVillainPSRImage

        public static java.lang.String getVillainPSRImage(java.lang.String choice)
        Returns the filepath for the image representing a villain's choice in a game of paper, scissors, rock.
        Parameters:
        choice - A string representation of the villain's choice.
        Returns:
        A filepath to the appropriate image.

      • getMapArrowImage

        public static java.lang.String getMapArrowImage(Location direction,
                                                java.lang.String color)
        Returns the filepath for an arrow image.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction the returned arrow should be facing.
        color - The color of the arrow. "yellow" or "red" only.
        Returns:
        The filepath to the appropriate arrow image.
